scripts.build:frontend: npm run build -w @kv/landing && npm run build -w @kv/dashboard && npm run build -w @kv/docs
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run build -w @kv/infrastructure && npm run deploy -w @kv/infrastructure
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build -w @kv/landing && npm run build -w @kv/dashboard
scripts.deploy:dashboard: npm run build -w @kv/dashboard && npm run deploy -w @kv/infrastructure
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy -w @kv/infrastructure
scripts.deploy:complete: npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy -w @kv/infrastructure && npm run upload:s3
scripts.upload:s3: aws s3 sync packages/landing/dist/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name KVLandingStack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`LandingBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text)/ --delete && aws s3 sync packages/dashboard/dist/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name KVDashboardStack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`DashboardBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text)/ --delete && aws s3 sync packages/docs/dist/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name KVDocsStack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`DocsBucketName`].OutputValue' --output text)/ --delete
scripts.loadtest:report: artillery run artillery.yml --output report.json && artillery report report.json
